Package chinook.assignment.repositories

Interface CustomerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<Customer,Integer>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerRepositoryImpl
public interface CustomerRepository extends CrudRepository<Customer,Integer>
This is an Interface for CustomerRepository. This interface extends functionality from CrudRepository.

      Parameters:

      offset - is int parameter for customer from customer_id offset
      Returns:
